alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington; Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington; Yakima Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued January 26 at 3:01AM PST until January 26 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in freezing fog. * WHERE...In Oregon, Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Oregon and Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon. In Washington, Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington, Yakima Valley and Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential frost on bridges.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington; Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington; Yakima Valley
